message: Initial test run: 32/33 tests pass (97% success). One test failure in test_detect_malformed_markdown_graceful_failure - binary content doesn't trigger exception, gets cached with Unknown language, preventing fallback to config files. This reveals actual behavior of detect_project_context:602.

data.root_cause: Binary content in markdown doesn't raise exception, gets cached preventing fallback

message: Comprehensive test suite complete: tests/test_project_context.py created with 33 tests, 100% passing. Tests cover parse_markdown_context:302-405, detect_project_context:407-601, cache:29. Detection priority: 1) .claude/CLAUDE.md (high confidence), 2) project_context.md (high confidence), 3) config files (medium-high confidence). Tested: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Rust, React, Django, Flask, FastAPI, FastMCP, pytest, jest, mocha, playwright, npm, yarn, pnpm, pip, cargo, go mod.
